reviewDetails.comment: Very good experience with Dr. Coun.
Dr. Coun is the warmest and most thoughtful primary care doctor I've ever seen! I highly recommend him.
He’s the best at listening

Dr. Coun was wonderful. He seemed curious and relaxed—I didn't feel like he was rushing out the door. He wanted to know how I  was doing and listen to any concerns I had. He was kind and knowledgable. His staff was efficient, and got me in and out quickly.
My first visit to Dr. Coun was great. I would definitely recommend him.
The doctor was engaged and attentive. He took genuine interest in my health.
Dr. Coun is professional, knowledgeable, and caring. Astute and sincere. Cares about follow up and great with referrals.
Dr.Coun, was great! He really listened to my concerns and spent time getting to know me. I highly recommend.
